name: Chaotic
description:
When a "Rising" Combat Art is used with equipped tome, decrease the cost of that art by 4 SP. Roll 2d6 and choose one roll, that art becomes the one you chose:
1. Rising Thunder
2. Rising Wind
3. Rising Flame
4. Rising Frost
5. Rising Light
6. Your choice of 1-5.
If you roll doubles, use the Variant version.

Disabled on non-Reason weapons.
comment: Items in modifers should be integers
